txt.en: Deliver Skegghorn's horns to Elgur at Amdân

Elgur can be found at Amdân during the Battle of Azanulbizar in T.A. 2799.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe at Azanulbizar. You should deliver it to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim.
After encountering the great dale-ox, Skegghorn, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

After encountering the great dale-ox, Skegghorn, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

As you inspect Skegghorn's horns, you make an unexpected discovery. To your surprise, there seem to be traces of mithril on Skegghorn's horns. If mithril might be found at Azanulbizar after the war's end, such a find would be worthy of note to Thráin!

You decide to bring this trophy to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim, that it might be appraised.

'Ah, what is this you have brought me?'

Elgur inspects Skegghorn's horns closely. After a moment, he pauses and his eyes widen.

'I do not believe it. There are traces of mithril! What long-lost seam had this mighty ox unwittingly discovered at Azanulbizar?! What a find, Hermáth!'
